participant_1.name: Samantha
participant_1.personality: Cheerful and nurturing, with a love for creativity and a hint of anxiety about the future.
participant_1.background: Knitting is my passion. I love to bake cookies. I am scared of dying. The county-wide bake sale is where I feel most at home. I have a few dogs.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: Friendly and supportive, with a strong attachment to family and a zest for outdoor activities.
participant_2.background: I am married to a doctor. I enjoy long walks with my dog. I am a professional tennis player. I live in a three-storey house. My family is continuously growing.

content.text: hello there! how are you doing?
